title: Child Benefit: small area data
description: Annual geographical estimates at Lower Super Output Area and Data Zone of the number of families and children claiming Child Benefit on 31 August of the year of analysis.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to latest link under heading "Official Statistics", on new page dataset consists of several files found under heading "Documents".

Cause of Death.description: Cause of death is reported by the care home provider and not necessarily based on laboratory confirmed tests, so is not directly comparable with Public Health Wales data.

sizingNotes: Simple tables and structures but spread over several files (though similar framework).
notes: Prioritised as data is not complex, but high value available from combining split regional data, and potentially bringing useful demographic insight
